title: PMK Towing Service - Add photos section to Draft Version 2

requirements.summary: Add the two uploaded images as public static assets and display them in a new labeled Photos section on the single-page homepage.
acceptanceCriteria: Both uploaded files are included in the repo under a public static path (e.g., frontend/public/assets/...) and can be loaded directly by the browser.
A new homepage section (e.g., "Photos" or "Gallery") displays both images in a responsive layout (1 column on mobile, 2 columns on tablet/desktop).
Each image includes English alt text appropriate to the photo content.
Images are styled to match the existing site theme (spacing, borders/radius, shadows) and do not break the existing layout.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded PNG to a public static assets path so it can be loaded directly by the browser.
Add the uploaded JPG to a public static assets path so it can be loaded directly by the browser.

Create a new Photos section component (single-page section with id="photos") that renders both static images from frontend/public/assets/uploads in a responsive 1-column (mobile) / 2-column (md+) grid; include English alt text for each image; match existing theme spacing, border radius, and shadow styling. Use shadcn/ui Card for consistent styling if appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new PhotosSection into the existing single-page layout (no new routes), placing it as a new clearly labeled section on the Draft Version 2 homepage without disrupting existing sections or the +917842969695 phone behavior.

requirements.summary: Add a header navigation link that smooth-scrolls to the new Photos section and works in both desktop and mobile menus.
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation includes a new link label in English (e.g., "Photos") that scrolls smoothly to the new photos section.
Mobile menu includes the same new navigation item and closes after selection, consistent with existing behavior.
All pre-existing navigation links (Home, Services, Service Area, Contact) still work as before.

file_operations.description: Add a new navLinks item (label "Photos", id "photos") to the existing header navigation so it uses the existing scrollToSection smooth-scroll behavior; ensure the mobile menu includes the same item and continues to close after selection; keep all existing navigation items and click-to-call behavior intact.
